import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import Reports from './Reports'; import Offices from './Offices'; const Dashboard = () => { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('dashboard'); const [animateReports, setAnimateReports] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { if (activeSection === 'reports') { setAnimateReports(false); const timer = setTimeout(() => setAnimateReports(true), 50); return () => clearTimeout(timer); } else { setAnimateReports(false); } }, [activeSection]); return (
